Project.Brief history of your project and organi: The 3000 Rice Genome Project is an international effort to sequence the genomes of 3,024 rice varieties from 89 countries.
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File:
The 3000 Rice Genome Project is an international effort to sequence the genomes of 3,024 rice varieties from 89 countries.
This data is available for anyone to use under the terms of the Toronto Statement.
Project.How do you plan to prepare the dataset: We use AWS-CLI to obtain the file list from the aws cloud, and then use script commands to save the files to the local server. Package the data into a car file according to the set size without changing the directory structure of the original dataset. It is distributed to SP via hard disk mail and http. Then issue the order through boost.
Project.In which geographies do you plan on maki: Asia other than Greater China, North America, South America, Europe
Project.How will you be distributing your data t: HTTP or FTP server, Shipping hard drives
